english.segment1: Does it have to start with a broken heart. Broken dreams and bleeding parts. We were young and world was clear. Young ambition disappears. I swore it would never come to this. The average, the obvious
english.segment2: I'm still discontented down here. I'm so discontented
english.segment3: If we only got one try. If we've only got one life. If time was never on our side. Before I die I want to burn out bright
english.segment4: So a spark ignites. In time and space. To make it through this human race. You fight and crawl your way back home. But you're running the wrong way
english.segment5: The future is a question mark. With kerosene electric sparks. There's still fire in you yet. Yeah there's still fire in you
english.segment6: If we only got one try. If we've only got one life. If time was never on our side. Before I die I want to burn out bright
english.segment7: I can't clean up the mess I've made. I can't clean up the mess I've made
english.segment8: Can't sleep in the bed I've made. Can't sleep in the bed I've made
english.segment9: If we only got one try. If we've only got one life. If time was never on our side. Before I die I want to burn out bright
